title: The Beauty’s Blade - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Historical   Martial Arts   Wuxia   Yuri
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cultivation   Enemies Become Lovers   Famous Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Murders   Narcissistic Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Revenge   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Shameless Protagonist   Tragic Past
author: Feng Ren Zuo Shu   封刃作书
description:
That woman was a beautiful one.

That sword was a good one.

In jianghu, there were very many people that walked into Fu Wanqing’s line of sight, yet there was only one person that had truly fallen into her heart.

The Whitepath Alliance? The Head of the Demonic Creed? She didn’t care about those things one bit.

She wanted that sword, and the beauty wielding it even more so.>
